content.query:
select * 
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/vendor_unquoted.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as vendor


select * 
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/vendor_escaped.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    ESCAPECHAR = '\\'
) as vendor


select * 
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/vendor.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDQUOTE = '"'
) as vendor
